name: Giovanni Trovato
title: Senior iOS Developer
profile: Senior iOS Developer with 7+ years building high-impact mobile applications used by 500K+ users across Enterprise and Consumer markets. Expert in Swift, SwiftUI, and modern iOS architecture patterns, with proven track record of delivering 5 App Store apps and implementing CI/CD pipelines that reduced deployment time by 75%. Known for architecting scalable solutions, mentoring junior developers, and driving technical excellence in cross-functional agile teams.

relevant_experience.title: Senior iOS Developer

relevant_experience.title: Mobile Developer
relevant_experience.description: Developed cross-platform mobile solutions for B2B sales teams, supporting 50K+ daily active users across 200+ companies. • Led complete UI/UX redesign that increased user engagement by 40% and reduced support tickets by 30% • Created reusable component library adopted across 3 mobile applications, reducing development time by 50% • Optimized app performance, achieving 60% faster load times and reducing crash rate to <0.1% • Collaborated with product managers to define technical requirements and sprint planning • Technologies: iOS (Swift, Objective-C), Android (Java), REST APIs, Git, SCRUM/Agile

relevant_experience.title: Mobile Developer Intern
relevant_experience.description: Developed cutting-edge Augmented Reality mobile applications using Vuforia and Wikitude SDKs for industrial clients. • Built AR prototype that secured €200K+ contract with major automotive manufacturer • Collaborated with senior architects and product managers in agile development environment • Delivered pixel-perfect implementations meeting strict client specifications and deadlines • Technologies: Android SDK, Java, Vuforia AR SDK, Wikitude SDK, RESTful APIs

education.description: Specialized graduate program in mobile development with focus on iOS (Swift, Objective-C, Cocoa Touch), Android (Java), and Windows Universal Apps. Thesis project: Cross-platform mobile architecture for enterprise applications. Graduated with honors.

Thesis: 'Capacitive sensors applications to silicon electrodes on a mold for RTM technology' - designed and built IoT sensor system with custom hardware, firmware, and data analysis software. Strong foundation in algorithms, data structures, and system design.
